attributes.additional_details:
Feets on seats are a source of cross infection to the unwary traveller.  Infection from dog faeces can cause blindness, meaning that a life is wasted and the carer's also.  Hospitals/doctors don't need any additional workloads. The economy loses many days through sickness.
A simple government poster campaign on public transport eg buses,trains etc with a fine for offenders.
The public will welcome the hygienic move as would many bus drivers.
